text: On þisre worulde fruman, god ælmihtig gesceop & geworhte onVIdagum ealle gesceafta & ðæs seofoðan dæges he gereste hine.
And on syx ylda is þeos woruld eac todæled, & seo seofoðe belimpð to þære ecan reste.

An yld is geteald of adame to noe, Oðer of noe to abrahame, ðridde of abrahame to dauide, feorðe of dauide to þam myclan heregange, Fifte of þam heregange to Christes gebyrdtiman, Sexte of ures drihtnes gebyrdtide; to þam ende þe god ana wat.
Seofoðe belimpð to þam toweardan life.
